ComicInfo.Summary:
NEW STORY ARC
RUMBLE #6 is a stand-alone story that is also the first chapter of the next big arc. Featuring a wraparound cover by JAMES HARREN and a variant cover by superstar LEE BERMEJO!
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|---------------|-----------------------------|------------------| | Reg | Regular Cover | James Harren & Dave Stewart | 1 | | Var | Variant Cover | Lee Bermejo | 2 |
ComicInfo.Title: A Woe That Is Madness Part One
